--- create_index.sql
create index foo_bar on foo (
  bar desc,
  baz asc,
)

--- AST
&ast.CreateIndex{
  Rparen: 53,
  Name:   &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 20,
        Name:    "foo_bar",
      },
    },
  },
  TableName: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 24,
        NameEnd: 27,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Keys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 36,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 32,
        NameEnd: 35,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Dir: "DESC",
    },
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 48,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 44,
        NameEnd: 47,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
      Dir: "ASC",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX foo_bar ON foo (bar DESC, baz ASC)
